SELECT rpr.`id` repairId, rpt.`id` reportId, rpr.`repair_phone` repairPhone, `open_id`, `name`, `number`, `phone`, `faculty`, `sort`, `address`, `img_url`, `description`, `date` FROM `report` rpt, `repair` rpr WHERE rpt.`id` = rpr.`report_id`
AND rpr.`status` = 0
AND rpr.`status` = 1
AND rpr.`status` = 2
AND rpr.`status` = 3
ORDER BY date DESC
